text: A lemmer kan Leqwoan isselea idurar, iceqqeq tamurt, ne$ issenieq ed lmeggtin! Xaii! Lumuo akw i Oebbi. Day ur eoin ara wid iumnen, ar, ma ihwa yaS, Oebbi ad Inhu medden meooa? Zgan wid ijehlen a ten tewwet ssixia, ilmend n wayen xeddmen. Ne$ a ppevou ar tama n yixxamen nnsen, alamma tusa d lemaahda n Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ipzeggil ppaaud
